column4: chapium... I just used the printer setup on my network at work
firststrike: i recall there's a hack out there to 'convert' gimp so that it's layout is the same as photoshop!
starz... skip vmware... virtualbox is better if u ask me
would it allow me to install XP on linux remotely?
: what do you mean by remotely?
i would need to run XP or w2k on my remote box that is running debian
is that possible to install windows in virtual box like that? without physical access to the box?
the best I know for accessing remote pc's is by using freenx
assuming that i will transfer windows iso to the box first of course
freenx beats the pants of RDP and VNC

let me explain... there is a box running debian. i would like to add a virtual machine on that host running windows... can i do it without physical access to the box by using iso image of windows to install?
oh hm so it's doable most likely
there is some software that won't run other way
